text: "Déjame gritar" is a pop/rock song performed by the Chilean band Kudai. It was released as the first single of their second album, Sobrevive 2006). ==Music video== The music video was the last music video to feature old band member, Nicole Natalino. The song was re-released in August 2006, with Gabriela Villalba's voice to promote the re-release of the album and recording a new version of the video. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !Chart (2008) !Position |- ! scope="row" |Argentina Top 20 | style="text-align:center;"|13 |- ! scope="row" |Chile Top 100 | style="text-align:center;"|1 |- |} ==References== == External links == *Kudai Official Site *EMI Music Mexico Category:2006 singles Category:Kudai songs Category:2006 songs Category:EMI Records singles
title: Déjame gritar
